p.if: Unless you have the codeword Calcium, lose 4 Stamina points because of the difficulty of breathing.

section.p: You step into a large dark hold. Your eyes have no time to adjust to the gloom before a translucent creature with many frail tentacles comes drifting forwards to exude a gobbet of grey vapour in your face.
‘Don’t breathe it in, captain!’ yells one of your men.
